note.p: Career: Practised at the Scottish Bar; MP for Whithorn in the Scottish Parliament (1702-1707), then in the British Parliament; Member of the Commission for the Union of Scotland and England (1707); Judge of the Scottish Court of Exchequer (1708); made a collection of antiquities; friend of Roger Gale (FRS 1717)
Notes: Proposed by Roger Gale; James Theobald; Sir Hans Sloane. DNB gives year of birth as 1684.
